text: Constantino Wilson is a retired Micronesian footballer who played as both a midfielder and a goalkeeper. ==International career== Wilson represented the Federated States of Micronesia at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
